name: simple
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: simple
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: easy to understand or do; not difficult

example.eg: The instructions were written in simple English.
example.egtrans: 这些说明书是用简单易懂的英语写成的。

example.eg: It's simple to find our house.
example.egtrans: 我们的房子很容易找到。

example.eg: I want an explanation, but keep/make it simple.
example.egtrans: 我需要解释，不过要简单些。

dsense.name: simple
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: used to describe the one important fact, truth, etc.

example.eg: We didn't go swimming for the simple reason that the water was too cold.
example.egtrans: 我们没去游泳纯粹是因为水太凉了。

dsense.name: simple
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: I like simple food better than fancy dishes.
example.egtrans: 比起精美的菜肴，我更喜欢平常的食物。

dsense.name: simple
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having or made of only one or a few parts

example.eg: A hammer is a simple tool.
example.egtrans: 锤子是一种简单的工具。

example.eg: Simple forms of life have only one cell.
example.egtrans: 简单的生命形式只有一个细胞。

dsense.name: simple
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: ordinary; traditional or natural rather than modern and complicated

example.eg: He was just a simple fisherman.

dsense.name: simple
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: A simple person does not have a normal level of intelligence.

example.egtrans: 他有点儿傻，但不会伤人。
